name: RetroBot Oscilloscope
description: RetroBot Oscilloscope is a vintage-themed robot belonging to the WebtrES club. With its sleek red body resembling a classic oscilloscope screen, this robot brings a touch of nostalgia to the digital world. Equipped with rossoCorsa box, retroConsole buttons, foundry arms and legs, and a snake-like screen, RetroBot Oscilloscope stands out among its robotic peers.
